titleStmt.title: Of the end of the world and iudgement of our Lord Iesus Christe to come, and of the moste perillous dangers of this our moste corrupt age, and by what meanes the godly may auoid the harmes thereof, sermons preached in latin in the assembly of the clergie by Henry Bullinger, and now lately englished by Thomas Potter
titleStmt.author: Bullinger, Heinrich, 1504-1575.
Potter, Thomas, fl. 1580.

notesStmt.note: Imprint in part from STC because title page as filmed too dark to read.
There are two editions of this work; one without a comma after "world " in the title and C2v catchword "moreouer", the other with a comma after "world" in the title and C2v catchword "more"--STC.
In this edition there is no comma after "world" in the title and C2v catchword is "moreouer".
Reproduction of the original in the Boston Public Library.
